item.title: Rustacean in Residence
item.description: Rustacean in Residence Systems programming is synonymous with coding in C/C++ at present. Immunant is exploring a new way to transition C code to newer systems programming languages such as Rust, Go, Nim, etc. We are looking for an additional team member & programming languages aficionado who loves to hack on compilers, language runtimes, and who believes that when machines finally become sentient, they will seek to eliminate their dependencies on libc before anything else.

item.title: Compiler, Linker, and Loader Whisperer
item.description: Immunant was founded to transition systems security research into practice. Our software has the potential to improve security for hundreds of millions of users without them ever noticing. Our tools change the way programs execute. Specifically, we alter the way code is compiled, linked, and loaded by the host OS. We are looking for an additional team member who is as excited about systems programming, compiler construction, information security research as we are.

item.title: Open Positions
item.description: 001: Compiler, Linker, and Loader Whisperer Location: Irvine CA. 002: Rustacean in Residence Location: Irvine CA. Applying Applicants must be willing to relocate to Southern California. Remote work is not an option unless the position is marked as such. Employment is conditional on applicants selected for employment passing worldwide background checks. Immunant participates in E-verify. Email your application to team [at] immunant.com or mail it to: .

item.title: Contributor License Agreement
item.description: If you are interested in contributing to Immunant’s open source projects, please complete, sign, and send us one of the following contributor license agreements. Send your signed copy to team [at] immunant.com. Contributor license agreement for individuals Contributor license agreement for entities
